inclusion.criterion: Male aged 18 years old or over
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Referred for video urodynamics within our department
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Predominant voiding LUTS as assessed by IPSS at screening
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Capacity to understand study procedures and give informed consent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: At least 2 voided volumes on frequency volume chart (FVC) of 250 mL
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Predominant storage LUTS on IPSS at screening
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Fewer than 2 voids on FVC > 250 mL
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Known pre-existing neurological cause for symptoms
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of BPH and multiple urological procedures, including suprapubic prostatectomy. He currently has a catheter in place due to a urethral stricture.
